entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 100 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 then light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
